name: WINNUKE - Tactical Cyberspace Espionage
description:
Hack into the system through 8 layers of security and crash the network.

Positioning is key, the security AI will try to swarm you and shut you down. Keep moving and don't let them corner you.

With each layer of security, increase your firepower with upgraded software and crush the opposition.

WINNUKE is a tactical, turn-based cyberspace roguelike that's easy to pick up but hard to win.

FEATURES
  • Coffee break-style gameplay with short rounds.
  • Upgrade your virus with different abilities
  • Wave Defense Mode
